extension.description: CloudSync V3 delivers instant synchronization of watched status, resume points, and favorites across multiple Kodi devices using lightweight MQTT messaging. Features real-time updates, HiveMQ Cloud integration, and add-only favorites sync. Note: Favorites removal must be done manually on each device to prevent sync conflicts.
extension.news: v3.0.0 - CloudSync V3: Add-Only Favorites Architecture - Simplified to add-only favorites sync (prevents Kodi cache conflicts) - Anti-loop protection prevents ping-pong broadcasts between devices - Manual removal required on each device (prevents sync wars) - Improved stability and reliability for favorites synchronization v2.0.2 - Fixed addon ID references and repository structure v2.0.1 - Repository automation update v2.0.0 - Initial release with MQTT-first architecture
